s: April 9, 2025 - Both the song and its accompanying dance, the "Teapot Tip", became enormously popular in America and overseas. The song was recorded and made famous by Art Kassel and His Kassels in the Air orchestra with featured vocalist Marion Holmes singing the tune. It was published in 1941 by Bluebird Records.
